ModMetaData.name: [AE] Monodagger
ModMetaData.author: Ian Ferguson
ModMetaData.description:
Adds a smaller, weaker, version of the monosword for use as a secondary weapon. That's it.
Slightly over half the stats as the full sword. Should be vanilla friendly, but requires defs from Royalty. Same Empire/Ultratech settings.
Can be manufactured after techprint and research.
Ideal for colonists/ideologies that don't like low-tech weapons.
Created with Simple Sidearms mod in mind, but it's not required. https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=927155256
Supports Combat Extended mod. https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1631756268
Supports DDS texture mods. https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1678847247 https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1676969930
2021-08-29: Added Combat Extended (CE) support via patching. Added build recipe and research Techprint (so you can unlock/research and manufacture). Added "unfinished" version texture. 2021-08-30: Added mod load-order settings. 2021-09-01: Added DDS texture versions where supported, to avoid PNG compression.
